Detailed Description

the VCard class is used to handle vCards (.vcf).

This class supports vCards as defined in version 2.1 of the vCard specification dated September 18, 1996 [1]. It can be used to parse vCard buffers received from a remote device and retrieve values of interest or to create vCard buffers by setting certain members of the class and writing the vCard data to a given buffer.

For further information about the vCard format including the full specification, RFCs, white papers and a mailing list please visit: http://www.imc.org/pdi/

[1] "vCard - The Electronic Business Card", Version 2.1, 18 September 1996 http://www.imc.org/pdi/vcard-21.doc

)  const
